headline: PepsiCo's Q3 Test: Can PBNA Gains Outweigh Frito-Lay Struggles?

headline: Coca-Cola's failed coffee investment faces uncertain future as sale rumors brew
summary: Coca-Cola CEO James Quincey says he's "rethinking" the company's Costa Coffee brand, raising questions about a potential sale.

headline: PepsiCo: The Company's Slowing Volume Sales Show Growth Has Stalled
summary: PepsiCo's core business is stagnating, with flat or negative sales volume in North American and global markets. Read why I reiterate strong sell rating on PEP.

headline: PepsiCo, Inc. (PEP): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on PepsiCo, Inc. on Value investing subreddit by raytoei. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on PEP. PepsiCo, Inc. ‘s share was trading at $152.16 as of August 19th. PEP’s trailing and forward P/E were 27.72 and 18.94 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. PepsiCo delivered resilient second-quarter results, […]
